text:
e="preserve">"Auferstanden aus Ruinen" (pron. [ˈaʊfɐˌʃtandən aʊs ʁuʔˈi:nən] "OU-fuh-SHTAHN-duhn ous roo-EE-nuhn"; German for "Risen from Ruins") was the national anthem of East Germany before the reunification with West Germany into Germany in 1990.
History.
In 1949, the Soviet occupation zone of Allied Occupied Germany became a country that was called East Germany. For the anthem, the poet Johannes R. Becher wrote the lyrics. The German composer Hanns Eisler composer the melody.
